item.title: Persistent static route via Windows registry
item.description: For whatever reason I was unable to set a static route via the route command. I assume the system was pending a reboot. However I did not have the time to schedule the outage. So I added the route directly to the registry. Problem solved, next. Persistent static routed are stored in the following registry key: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip \Parameters\PersistentRoutes Add a new String Value with the name destination,mask,gateway,metric Example
